column4: i installed flash 10 player plugin. however it doesnt show in ff3 plugins...only flash 9 which is not woring
i installed flash 10 player plugin. however it doesnt show in ff3 plugins...only flash 9 which is not working.
can anyone see my messages ?
okay cuz i thought it wasnt going through
well i need help with flash player
i can only watch youtube.....and its cappy
like volume function doesnt work
and i cant watch any other tube sites
i installed flash player 10 from adobe howeverhowing up its not even s
have you tried removing the flash9 plug in?
i dont know how
first try through the plugin interface / the interface that chooses what applications handle what content.
yes i only see flash 9 not 10
so I would try disabling it, then restarting firefox. You could also look around .profile and the install dir to manually remove flash9 first.
where is .profile ?
sorry; its now .mozilla
also /usr/lib/firefox  and /usr/lib/mozilla
you can also make sure that flash10 is properly installed in them (in the plugins dir)
i found flashplugin-alternative.so in plugins/
that should be it.  How did you install flash10?  far the tar.gz,  .deb or what?
.deb
you might try the tar.gz   it provides an install script, but you don't have to use it; you can copy the .so file included to the plugins dir and replace whatever is there.
okay
